info.detailed: I am a Front-End Angular Developer with experience in Back-End Development. I am currently working as a Front-End Developer while also teaching Front-End Development at

about.first_text: Hello, I am Konstantine Datunishvili, a Front-End Angular Developer. I have a passion for creating intuitive user interfaces via Angular.
about.second_text_second: since September 2021 and have previously worked on various projects and companies.
about.third_text: Also possess Back-End development knowledge and can build Full-Stack projects with Node & Angular. I strive to keep up with the latest trends in web development.
about.forth_text: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

details.1: As a Lecturer specializing in front-end development, I conduct live sessions for students on Microsoft Teams. All sessions are recorded for students to review at their convenience.
details.2: I cover topics such as HTML, CSS, SCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, SweetAlert, Angular, Angular Material, and provide a brief introduction to RxJS.
details.3: I also assign and evaluate homework to reinforce learning and provide feedback.
details.4: My goal is to create an engaging learning environment and equip students with the skills needed for successful careers in front-end development.

details.1: I was developing and maintain frontend applications based on Angular.
details.2: Developed UI/UX features in Angular as described and displayed in the graphical design, ensure and advice on the technical feasibility of the UI/UX designs.
details.3: Optimize applications for scalability, cross-browser, cross-device and built reusable code for future use.
details.4: Work products were written in HTML5, SCSS and Angular.

details.1: I am an experienced Full-stack developer specializing in Angular for Front-end development and Node.js with Express and MongoDB for Back-end development.
details.2: With a proven track record of successfully delivering projects, I have worked on various assignments creating dynamic user interfaces and implementing efficient data storage solutions.

registry_imdo.title: Registry Imdo
registry_imdo.description: This digital platform was designed for the verification of certificates designed by the Irish Imdo Maritime Authority. The aim of Maritime Authority of Irish Imdo is to come to a safe maritime environment in compliance with International Rules and Regulations.

iswavle.title: Iswavle
iswavle.description: This website provides free learning resources for Front End development. The website has a built-in code editor that allows you to write and experiment with code directly on the platform. You can practice with practical examples integrated into educational articles. The website is available only in the Georgian language.

qr_code.title: QR Code
qr_code.description: I have developed the scientific project titled 'Multi-level Access of Information Systems by QR Codes'. The idea has been successfully implemented and demonstrated through the example of a higher educational institution, specifically a university.

sliding_game.name: Sliding puzzle game
sliding_game.description: Starting at the top left corner, move the tiles in ascending order in the grid. The tile in the lower right corner should remain 'empty'.

memory_card_game.name: Memory card game
memory_card_game.description: The objective of the game is to match all pairs of cards as quickly as possible.

color_game.name: Color game
color_game.description: Guess the color based on the color format RGB or HEX. The colors are randomly generated.

qr_project.name: QR read & write
qr_project.description: Generate QR code with or without an image, or read a QR image.

realtime_chat.name: Realtime Chat
realtime_chat.description: Join our real-time chat platform to connect instantly with others in general or specialized groups.

qa_exercise.name: QA Exercise
qa_exercise.description: Discover hidden bugs and vulnerabilities in your Simple Auth/OAuth 2.0 system with our expert testing.

contact.description: I'm currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

archive.subtitle: A list of things I've worked on, which are public, as well have some projects that aren't published or are private.
archive.title: Title

qr.title: Multi-level access to information systems by QR codes for wearable devices

role.title: My role in article
role.text_1: I was the developer responsible for maintaining all of the code and transforming the entire idea into an app.

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.text_1: The scientific project "Multi-level access of information systems by QR codes for wearable devices" was carried out within the framework of the scientific grant project of Batumi State University.
abstract.text_2: The idea is practically implemented and discussed in the example of a higher educational institution (university). Various areas of business and state organizations where successful practical implementation of the obtained results is possible are also mentioned.
abstract.text_3: Based on scientific research, an original software product was created, by means of which only one static QR code placed on different objects (in our research mode, BSU auditorium) allows people with different statuses to access different data, in our case, employees and students. At the same time, the QR code assigned to the room remains unchanged even if the processes in the room change, which excludes frequent changes in the graphic image (QR code) placed on the room(object).
abstract.text_4: The mentioned changes will be implemented only in electronic form on the web page where this information is posted and the user will receive only the updated information. For another example, the method can be used to digitize cities, including tourist facilities, restaurants, cafes, banks, etc., to provide different information about users of different access levels (loyalty programs, etc.) through a single QR code.
abstract.text_5: The field of the practical application of the system can be quite wide in terms of its simplicity and technological practicality. Research methodology is based on modern achievements of computer technology, Internet technologies, and programming tools. These technologies are widely used in the research process and in one of the results of the research - the software product.
